title: With the new balance changes on the Juggernauts, Mordekaiser players will be like

replies.body: Actually, by being forcibly shoehorned into a bot lane duo, a lot of Mordekaiser players including myself will probably stop playing morde, and new people will pick him up to take their spots.
I personally think Soraka would be a strong support for him (he'd never have to leave lane!)
i actually have tried this very concept with current morde and i found it to be surprisingly strong. So yea its gonna be pretty good :D
The only viable place where Morde could see play, would be the support actually....

no, because his W would steal creeps and his passive exp bonus in a duo lane only comes from landing the killing blow.

Morde isn't gonna be a good support, he's just gonna be useless. low damage, moderate durability, and being shoehorned into replacing the one essential champion that the game is balanced around *always* having isn't gonna make him viable, it's gonna make him even more useless than ever before.

He'll just be a bit better than average in a duo kill lane and that's it.

RIP Top Morde,
RIP Mid Morde,
RIP Jungle Morde.
